tasks.title: Set Up Project Structure and Dependencies
tasks.description: Initialize the project with necessary dependencies and structure.
tasks.details: Create a new project using the specified tech stack. Install required libraries and frameworks. Set up the project structure with necessary directories and files.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify the project structure and dependencies are correctly set up by running a basic build and ensuring no errors are present.

subtasks.title: Initialize Project with Tech Stack
subtasks.description: Set up the project using the specified technology stack.
subtasks.details: Use the latest versions of the tech stack components and ensure compatibility.
subtasks.testStrategy: Run a basic build to ensure no errors are present.

subtasks.title: Install Required Libraries and Frameworks
subtasks.description: Install all necessary libraries and frameworks.
subtasks.details: Ensure all dependencies are up to date and correctly configured.
subtasks.testStrategy: Check the installation by importing and using the libraries in a test script.

subtasks.title: Set Up Project Structure
subtasks.description: Create necessary directories and files.
subtasks.details: Organize the project structure to include directories for source code, tests, and configurations.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify the structure by navigating through the directories and checking file existence.

subtasks.title: Activate RLS for inventory Table
subtasks.description: Enable RLS on the inventory table.
subtasks.details: Create RLS policies for the inventory table allowing full access to admins and restricted access to users.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test RLS by attempting access with different user roles.

subtasks.title: Activate RLS for inventory_transactions Table
subtasks.description: Enable RLS on the inventory_transactions table.
subtasks.details: Create RLS policies for the inventory_transactions table allowing full access to admins and restricted access to users.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test RLS by attempting access with different user roles.

subtasks.title: Activate RLS for contracts Table
subtasks.description: Enable RLS on the contracts table.
subtasks.details: Create RLS policies for the contracts table allowing full access to admins and restricted access to users.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test RLS by attempting access with different user roles.

subtasks.title: Activate RLS for contract_reminders Table
subtasks.description: Enable RLS on the contract_reminders table.
subtasks.details: Create RLS policies for the contract_reminders table allowing full access to admins and restricted access to users.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test RLS by attempting access with different user roles.

subtasks.title: Activate RLS for Remaining Tables
subtasks.description: Enable RLS on the remaining tables.
subtasks.details: Create RLS policies for order_status_history, notifications, admin_notifications, and payment_confirmations tables.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test RLS by attempting access with different user roles on each table.

tasks.title: Implement Homepage and Core Pages
tasks.description: Create the homepage and other core public pages.
tasks.details: Develop the homepage (`/`) and other core pages (`/catalog`, `/quote-simulator`, `/contact`, `/samples`) using the provided templates and requirements. Ensure all buttons and sections are functional.
tasks.testStrategy: Test each page to ensure all buttons and sections are working as expected. Verify navigation and static content.

tasks.title: Implement Contact Form
tasks.description: Create the contact form with validation and submission.
tasks.details: Develop the contact form on the `/contact` page with Zod validation for each field. Ensure the form submits to the `/api/contact` endpoint and sends an email via SendGrid.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the form by filling out all fields and submitting. Verify that the data is correctly sent to the backend and an email is sent.

tasks.title: Implement Sample Request Form
tasks.description: Create the sample request form with dynamic fields and validation.
tasks.details: Develop the sample request form on the `/samples` page with dynamic fields and validation. Ensure the form submits to the `/api/samples` endpoint and stores data in the `sample_requests` table.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the form by adding multiple sample items and submitting. Verify that the data is correctly stored in the database.

tasks.title: Implement Product Catalog Page
tasks.description: Create the product catalog page with filtering and sorting.
tasks.details: Develop the product catalog page (`/catalog`) with filtering options for category, material, and thickness. Implement client-side search and sorting, but recommend server-side implementation.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the filtering, search, and sorting features. Verify that the correct products are displayed based on the selected filters.

subtasks.title: Move Search Functionality to Server Side
subtasks.description: Transfer the search functionality from client to server side.
subtasks.details: Modify the `/catalog` endpoint to handle search queries on the server side. Update the frontend to send search requests to the server.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test by performing searches and verifying results are fetched from the server.

subtasks.title: Move Sorting Functionality to Server Side
subtasks.description: Transfer the sorting functionality from client to server side.
subtasks.details: Update the `/catalog` endpoint to handle sorting on the server side. Adjust the frontend to send sorting parameters to the server.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test by applying different sorting options and verifying the results are sorted correctly.

subtasks.title: Implement Server-Side Filtering for Orders
subtasks.description: Move order search and date filtering to the server side.
subtasks.details: Modify the `/member/orders` endpoint to handle search and date filtering on the server side. Update the frontend to send relevant parameters.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test by searching and filtering orders, ensuring results are accurate.

subtasks.title: Implement Server-Side Search for Quotations
subtasks.description: Move quotation search functionality to the server side.
subtasks.details: Update the `/member/quotations` endpoint to handle search queries on the server side. Adjust the frontend to send search requests to the server.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test by searching for quotations and verifying the results are fetched from the server.

subtasks.title: Implement Server-Side Status Filtering for Samples and Inquiries
subtasks.description: Move status filtering for samples and inquiries to the server side.
subtasks.details: Modify the `/member/samples` and `/member/inquiries` endpoints to handle status filtering on the server side. Update the frontend to send status parameters.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test by applying status filters and verifying the results are filtered correctly.

tasks.title: Implement Quotation Simulator
tasks.description: Create the quotation simulator with multiple steps and validation.
tasks.details: Develop the quotation simulator (`/quote-simulator`) with multiple steps for product selection, specifications, and quantity. Ensure each step is validated and the final step generates a PDF.
tasks.testStrategy: Test each step of the simulator. Verify that the data is correctly processed and a PDF is generated.

tasks.title: Implement Authentication Pages
tasks.description: Create the authentication pages for login, registration, and logout.
tasks.details: Develop the authentication pages (`/auth/signin`, `/auth/register`, `/auth/signout`) with form validation and API calls. Ensure secure user authentication and session management.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the login, registration, and logout functionalities. Verify that users can successfully authenticate and sessions are managed correctly.

tasks.title: Implement Member Dashboard
tasks.description: Create the member dashboard with order and quotation management.
tasks.details: Develop the member dashboard (`/member/dashboard`) with widgets for order and quotation management. Ensure data is fetched from the appropriate APIs and displayed correctly.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the dashboard by logging in as a member. Verify that all widgets display the correct data and links navigate to the appropriate pages.

tasks.title: Implement Order Management Pages
tasks.description: Create pages for order management including order list and details.
tasks.details: Develop the order management pages (`/member/orders`, `/member/orders/[id]`) with filtering, search, and detailed order information. Ensure data is fetched from the `orders` table.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the order management pages by creating and managing orders. Verify that the correct data is displayed and filters work as expected.

tasks.title: Implement Quotation Management Pages
tasks.description: Create pages for quotation management including quotation list and details.
tasks.details: Develop the quotation management pages (`/member/quotations`, `/member/quotations/[id]`) with filtering, search, and detailed quotation information. Ensure data is fetched from the `quotations` table.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the quotation management pages by creating and managing quotations. Verify that the correct data is displayed and filters work as expected.

tasks.title: Implement Admin Dashboard
tasks.description: Create the admin dashboard with statistics and order management.
tasks.details: Develop the admin dashboard (`/admin/dashboard`) with widgets for statistics and order management. Ensure data is fetched from the appropriate tables and displayed correctly.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the admin dashboard by logging in as an admin. Verify that all widgets display the correct data and links navigate to the appropriate pages.

tasks.title: Implement Admin Order Management
tasks.description: Create pages for admin order management including order list and details.
tasks.details: Develop the admin order management pages (`/admin/orders`, `/admin/orders/[id]`) with detailed order information and status updates. Ensure data is fetched from the `orders` table.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the admin order management pages by creating and managing orders. Verify that the correct data is displayed and status updates work as expected.

tasks.title: Implement Admin Production Management
tasks.description: Create pages for admin production management including job list and details.
tasks.details: Develop the admin production management pages (`/admin/production`, `/admin/production/[id]`) with detailed job information and status updates. Ensure data is fetched from the `production_jobs` table.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the admin production management pages by creating and managing production jobs. Verify that the correct data is displayed and status updates work as expected.

tasks.title: Implement Admin Shipment Management
tasks.description: Create pages for admin shipment management including shipment list and details.
tasks.details: Develop the admin shipment management pages (`/admin/shipments`, `/admin/shipments/[id]`) with detailed shipment information. Ensure data is fetched from the `shipments` table.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the admin shipment management pages by creating and managing shipments. Verify that the correct data is displayed.

tasks.title: Implement Admin Contract Management
tasks.description: Create pages for admin contract management including contract list and details.
tasks.details: Develop the admin contract management pages (`/admin/contracts`, `/admin/contracts/[id]`) with detailed contract information and signing requests. Ensure data is fetched from the `contracts` table.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the admin contract management pages by creating and managing contracts. Verify that the correct data is displayed and signing requests work as expected.

tasks.title: Implement Member Profile Management
tasks.description: Create pages for member profile management including profile view and edit.
tasks.details: Develop the member profile management pages (`/member/profile`, `/member/edit`) with profile information and editing capabilities. Ensure data is fetched from the `profiles` table.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the member profile management pages by logging in as a member. Verify that the profile information is displayed correctly and can be edited.

tasks.title: Implement Member Settings
tasks.description: Create the member settings page with various toggles and options.
tasks.details: Develop the member settings page (`/member/settings`) with toggles for notifications and account options. Ensure data is stored in the appropriate tables.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the member settings page by toggling various options. Verify that the settings are correctly saved and applied.

subtasks.title: Create Settings API Endpoint
subtasks.description: Generate the API endpoint for settings.
subtasks.details: Develop the `/api/settings` endpoint to handle settings data.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the endpoint by sending requests and verifying responses.

subtasks.title: Implement Notification Toggles
subtasks.description: Add toggles for notifications in the settings page.
subtasks.details: Create toggles for quote update notifications and ensure they are saved in the database.
subtasks.testStrategy: Toggle the notification settings and confirm they are stored correctly.

subtasks.title: Add Email Toggles
subtasks.description: Include toggles for email preferences.
subtasks.details: Implement toggles for promotional emails and newsletters, storing preferences in the database.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test email preference toggles and verify storage in the database.

subtasks.title: Create Login Notification Toggle
subtasks.description: Add a toggle for login notifications.
subtasks.details: Develop a toggle for login notifications and ensure it is saved in the user's settings.
subtasks.testStrategy: Toggle the login notification setting and check if it is saved.

subtasks.title: Store Settings in Database
subtasks.description: Save settings data in the appropriate tables.
subtasks.details: Ensure all settings data is stored in either the `user_metadata` or `settings` table.
subtasks.testStrategy: Check the database to confirm settings are stored in the correct tables.

subtasks.title: Develop Member Settings Page
subtasks.description: Create the member settings page.
subtasks.details: Design and develop the `/member/settings` page with all the implemented toggles and options.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the member settings page by toggling options and verifying they are saved and applied.

tasks.title: Implement Critical Security Fixes
tasks.description: Implement critical security fixes for admin APIs and order/quote permissions.
tasks.details: Add authentication to all `/api/admin/*` endpoints. Implement user_id checks for order and quote management APIs. Ensure all critical security issues are resolved.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the security fixes by attempting unauthorized access and verifying that all checks are in place.

subtasks.title: Add Authentication to Jobs Endpoint
subtasks.description: Implement authentication for the jobs endpoint.
subtasks.details: Add authentication middleware to `/api/admin/production/jobs` endpoint. Ensure only authenticated users can access.
subtasks.testStrategy: Attempt access without authentication and verify access is denied.

subtasks.title: Add Authentication to Jobs ID Endpoint
subtasks.description: Implement authentication for the jobs ID endpoint.
subtasks.details: Add authentication middleware to `/api/admin/production/jobs/[id]` endpoint. Ensure only authenticated users can access.
subtasks.testStrategy: Attempt access without authentication and verify access is denied.

subtasks.title: Add Authentication to Workflow Endpoint
subtasks.description: Implement authentication for the workflow endpoint.
subtasks.details: Add authentication middleware to `/api/admin/contracts/workflow` endpoint. Ensure only authenticated users can access.
subtasks.testStrategy: Attempt access without authentication and verify access is denied.

subtasks.title: Implement verifyAdminAuth Helper Function
subtasks.description: Create a helper function for admin authentication.
subtasks.details: Develop `verifyAdminAuth()` function to handle admin authentication checks. Use this function in relevant endpoints.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the helper function with valid and invalid admin credentials.

subtasks.title: Add User ID Checks for Order Management
subtasks.description: Implement user ID checks for order management APIs.
subtasks.details: Add checks to ensure the user_id matches the authenticated user for order management APIs.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test order management APIs with mismatched user IDs and verify access is denied.

subtasks.title: Add User ID Checks for Quote Management
subtasks.description: Implement user ID checks for quote management APIs.
subtasks.details: Add checks to ensure the user_id matches the authenticated user for quote management APIs.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test quote management APIs with mismatched user IDs and verify access is denied.

subtasks.title: Review and Resolve Critical Security Issues
subtasks.description: Ensure all critical security issues are resolved.
subtasks.details: Conduct a security review and address any remaining critical security issues. Ensure all endpoints are secure.
subtasks.testStrategy: Perform a security audit and penetration testing to identify and fix any vulnerabilities.

subtasks.title: Final Testing of Security Fixes
subtasks.description: Test the implemented security fixes.
subtasks.details: Test all security fixes by attempting unauthorized access and verifying that all checks are in place.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test all endpoints with various authentication scenarios to ensure security measures are effective.
